sentence.Network_en: On closer inspection, aardvark appears to include other animal features as well.
sentence.Network_cn: 再近距离仔细观察就会发现, 土豚身上似乎还有其他动物的特征.

sentence.Network_en: Aardvark is a blue and small mammal.
sentence.Network_cn: 食蚁兽先生是一种蓝色的小型哺乳动物.

sentence.Network_en: Aardvark is a small and blue mammal.
sentence.Network_cn: 食蚁兽先生是一种小型的蓝色哺乳动物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. from South African Dutch, from aarde 'earth' + vark 'pig'

encyclopedia.content: Aardvark(http://vark.com/)是一款社交和日常生活信息搜索引擎。公司总部为美国加州旧金山市.。

means.word_mean: 1. nocturnal burrowing mammal of the grasslands of Africa that feeds on termites; sole extant representative of the order Tubulidentata
